Citation
.
""Everything Everywhere All at Once""
.
<p><cite>Everything Everywhere All at Once</cite></p>
.


Linked citation
.
[""Everything Everywhere All at Once""](#)
.
<p><a href="#"><cite>Everything Everywhere All at Once</cite></a></p>
.


Cited link
.
""[Everything Everywhere All at Once](#)""
.
<p><cite><a href="#">Everything Everywhere All at Once</a></cite></p>
.


Citation with inline content
.
""Everything Everywhere _All_ at Once""
.
<p><cite>Everything Everywhere <em>All</em> at Once</cite></p>
.


With other punctuation
.
""Doctor Who""’s companion
.
<p><cite>Doctor Who</cite>’s companion</p>
.


Multiple citations
.
""Everything"" and ""Everywhere""
.
<p><cite>Everything</cite> and <cite>Everywhere</cite></p>
.


Multiple citations in a sentence
.
See ""Everything"" and ""Everywhere"" all at once
.
<p>See <cite>Everything</cite> and <cite>Everywhere</cite> all at once</p>
.


Empty citation
.
""""
.
<p><cite></cite></p>
.


Citation includes attributes
.
""Les Misérables""{lang=fr}
.
<p><cite lang="fr">Les Misérables</cite></p>
.
